description: '''Sacramentum''' is a [[melodic black metal]] band from [[Falköping]], Sweden, formed by Nisse Karlén (vocals/guitar) in the summer of 1990 under the name of '''Tumulus'''. The band released three full-length studio albums and two demos. They are best known for their debut album ''[[Far Away from the Sun]]'', which is often considered one of the best early melodic black metal releases.
